title: 2 Bedroom Apartment at Altair | Dog Friendly
app_fee: The application fee is $50 per adult applicant.
posting_body: ['Receive', 'one month rent free', 'when you move within 90-days from the date you apply.', 'Plus, receive a', 'waived app fee', 'when you apply within 48 hours of your tour!', 'Terms and conditions apply.', 'Offer available for a limited time and subject to change.', 'Must sign a 12 month lease or longer to qualify.', '2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom | $2,278-2,510/month | 982-1,097 sq.', 'ft.', 'Schedule your private tour:', '<URL>', 'Altair offers a variety of open-concept floor plans including studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Find the perfect home to compliment your style with 2 finish palettes to choose from.', 'Each residence is fully equipped with IOTAS Smart Home Technology, including smart lights, outlets, and thermostat you can control anytime, anywhere.', 'Our high-end finishes and extensive amenities include granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, kitchen tile backsplash, outdoor pool, club room, coworking, fitness center with private yoga studio and Fitness on Demand virtual classes, and private outdoor dog park.', 'Located adjacent to Fridley Transit Station on the Northstar Commuter Rail, Altair is just one stop away from Target Field Station and offers direct access to Downtown Minneapolis.', 'View our extensive list of community and in-home amenities, designed to enhance your lifestyle.', 'Community Amenities', 'Outdoor pool', 'Club Room with full kitchen', 'Lounge with double-sided fireplace', 'Game Room with Billiards', 'Fitness Center', 'Private Yoga Studio including Fitness on Demand', 'Coworking Lounge', 'Private Outdoor Dog Park', 'Dog Wash', 'Exterior Patio with firepit, grilling station, and outdoor seating', 'Lobby', 'Coffee Bar', 'Package Concierge & Overflow Package Room', 'Professional on-site management', '24/7 emergency maintenance', 'Home Amenities & Finishes', 'Smart Home Technology', '100 Mbps high-speed internet ($20/month)', 'Convergent billing (No setup.', 'Just move in)', 'Two finish palettes available', 'Private balcony/patio', 'Black matte accent light fixtures', 'Subway tile kitchen backsplash', 'Granite countertops', 'Wood-look vinyl plank flooring', 'Contrasting upper and lower kitchen cabinetry', 'Plush bedroom carpeting', 'Accent island pendant lighting', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'GE® ENERGY STAR® In-unit washer and dryer', 'Glass shower enclosures', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
